title: [2.54.0] Panic on setting up a node on gnosis
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: **2.54.0**

OS & Version: **Debian 12 on Linux with kernel 6.1.0-13**

Commit hash: -

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

Consensus Layer: lighthouse

Consensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

Chain/Network:  gnosis

#### Expected behaviour

It should start up and start setting up the archive node.

#### Actual behaviour

it crashes with the included stack trace. this is a completely fresh setup

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


Run erigon like this,

```
/home/debian/erigon --datadir /home/debian/data/erigon-gnosis --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon,engine --chain gnosis --prune=htcr --prune.h.older=500000 --prune.t.older=500000 --prune.r.older=500000 --prune.c.older=500000 --rpc.returndata.limit=200000 --http.vhosts=* --private.api.addr=localhost:7090 --private.api.ratelimit=1024 --rpc.streaming.disable=true --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.port 7545 --authrpc.port 7551 --torrent.port 7091 --p2p.allowed-ports 7191,7192,7193 --port 40303 --authrpc.addr 0.0.0.0 --ws --maxpeers 250 --torrent.upload.rate=100mb --torrent.download.rate=1024mb
```
